sentences.en: Compared to people living only a few generations ago, we have greater opportunities to have a good time.
sentences.cn: 比起上几辈人，我们有更多机会享受生活。

sentences.en: Four generations live under one roof.
Generations of adults and children have delighted in the story.
sentences.cn: 一代又一代的成年人和儿童都很喜欢这个故事。

sentences.en: Generations of students have learnt to parrot the standard explanations.
sentences.cn: 一代又一代学生学会了机械地重复这些标准解释。

sentences.en: His has been a peasant familly for generations.
In the process of their careful watching and recording the celestial movements the Chinese provided valuable and interesting information for succeeding generations.
sentences.cn: 古代中国人在仔细观察、认真记录天体运动的过程里，为后代留下了宝贵而又有趣的资料。

sentences.en: My family has been engaged in farming for generations.
That family has carried on a hardware business for five generations.
sentences.cn: 那家已经经营五金生意五代了.

sentences.en: The house had belonged to her family for three or four generations.
sentences.cn: 这套房子归她们家有三四代人了。

sentences.en: The land here has been intensively cultivated for generations.
sentences.cn: 这片土地经过了几代人的集约耕作.

sentences.en: These diamonds have been handed down in his family for generations.
sentences.cn: 这些钻石在他家已经传了好几代.

sentences.en: These poems have helped kindle the imagination of generations of children.
sentences.cn: 这些诗激发了一代又一代孩子的想象力。

sentences.en: They will affect generations of Britons still unborn.
sentences.cn: 他们将会影响还未出世的好几代英国人。

sentences.en: This heirloom has been handed for several generations.
sentences.cn: 此项产业已经数代相传了.

sentences.en: To our minds, capital construction is a fundamental task crucial for generations to come.
sentences.cn: 在我们看来, 基本建设是百年大计.

trans.tran_cn: 代( generation的名词复数 )，（家史中的）一代，产生，一批
trans.tran_en: A generation is all the people in a group or country who are of a similar age, especially when they are considered as having the same experiences or attitudes
